QuestData.Title: The Dark Shaman
QuestData.Description: These dark shaman have been down here for months, raising beasts and performing dark rituals.$b$bI don't know what they aim to achieve with all of this, but it's clear that they are no friend of the Horde. That's where you come in, $n.$b$bFight your way through the chasm and kill Dark Shaman Koranthal and Lava Guard Gordoth.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat Dark Shaman Koranthal and Lava Guard Gordoth.
QuestData.RewardText: It would seem that the dark shaman experiments drove Gordoth insane.$b$bHopefully we've seen the last of this, $n.
